20110127160120.000|20110127160123.000|TR0|alert system. Officials say the system

20110127160141.000|20110127160144.000|TR0|the causes of the 2008 financial meltdown 
20110127160144.000|20110127160147.000|TR0|is out with its final report today.  The 
20110127160147.000|20110127160150.000|TR0|commission says the crisis could have been 
20110127160150.000|20110127160153.000|TR0|avoided had the government been on the 
20110127160153.000|20110127160156.000|TR0|ball.  The report faults the actions taken 
20110127160156.000|20110127160159.000|TR0|by just about every major government 
20110127160159.000|20110127160202.000|TR0|figure involved in the crisis in both the 
20110127160202.000|20110127160205.000|TR0|Bush and Obama administrations.
20110127160205.000|20110127160208.000|TR0|
20110127160208.000|20110127160211.000|TR0|Slammed and slammed again.  Much of the

20110127160214.000|20110127160217.000|TR0|from another big snowstorm.

20110127160222.000|20110127160225.000|TR0|more than 14 inches. Just over a foot fell 
20110127160225.000|20110127160228.000|TR0|yesterday in Central Park, toppling the 
20110127160228.000|20110127160231.000|TR0|record set in 1871.
20110127160231.000|20110127160234.000|TR0|
20110127160234.000|20110127160237.000|TR0|In Newark, New Jersey, 11 inches.  And 
20110127160237.000|20110127160240.000|TR0|some areas have gotten more snow today.

20110127160249.000|20110127160252.000|TR0|the right amount for a snowball fight and 
20110127160252.000|20110127160255.000|TR0|to give you a great big headache.

20110127161558.000|20110127161601.000|TR0|gun dealers without a record of being

20110127161604.000|20110127161607.000|TR0|Tobacco and Firearms, more than 21,000

20110127163054.000|20110127163057.000|TR0|THOMPSON:  Well, this is an extremely 
20110127163057.000|20110127163100.000|TR0|important point.  Is that people often 
20110127163100.000|20110127163103.000|TR0|think that the internet and social 
20110127163103.000|20110127163105.000|TR0|networks are always add power to the 
20110127163105.000|20110127163108.000|TR0|protesters.  They always add power to the 
20110127163108.000|20110127163111.000|TR0|people. But they forget that all internet 
20110127163111.000|20110127163114.000|TR0|traffic -- most internet traffic flows 
20110127163114.000|20110127163117.000|TR0|over pipes which the government controls.  
20110127163117.000|20110127163120.000|TR0|So it's actually fairly easy for a 
20110127163120.000|20110127163123.000|TR0|government to either shut down access to a 
20110127163123.000|20110127163126.000|TR0|site or to track people.
20110127163126.000|20110127163129.000|TR0|
20110127163129.000|20110127163132.000|TR0|So, sometimes in many of these situations, 
20110127163132.000|20110127163135.000|TR0|the power of the internet can actually 
20110127163135.000|20110127163138.000|TR0|help the government more than it helps the 
20110127163138.000|20110127163141.000|TR0|people.  We saw in Iran a year and a half 
20110127163141.000|20110127163144.000|TR0|ago, a lot of people thought that twitter 
20110127163144.000|20110127163147.000|TR0|was going to bring down the Iranian 
20110127163147.000|20110127163150.000|TR0|regime.  The Iranian government was 
20110127163150.000|20110127163153.000|TR0|actually able to track people on twitter 
20110127163153.000|20110127163156.000|TR0|so it may have given power to the regime.  
20110127163156.000|20110127163159.000|TR0|So you can't always think that these 
20110127163159.000|20110127163202.000|TR0|social networks are a force for the 
20110127163202.000|20110127163205.000|TR0|protesters.

20110127163225.000|20110127163228.000|TR0|It doesn't create revolutions or things
